title: AssetDump v2 Core Definitions
description: Shared schema fragments reused across AssetDump v2 Facts, Relations, Indexes and Metrics documents.
$comment: The root schema describes the canonical AssetPK structure and exposes it via the #AssetPK anchor.

CollectionID.description: Stable identifier for a serialized collection (e.g., sharedassets1.assets, BUILTIN-EXTRA).

StableKey.description: Deterministic key '<collectionId>:<pathId>' used for ordered indexing.

Timestamp.description: UTC timestamp in extended ISO-8601 form (e.g., 2025-11-02T13:30:00Z).

UnityGuid.description: 32 hex characters (or canonical GUID) produced by Unity tooling.

CompressionCodec.description: Supported compression codecs for AssetDump shards.

AssetRef.description: Structured reference to a Unity asset using collectionId + pathId.

pathId.description: Unity m_PathID within the referenced collection.

NullableAssetRef.description: Optional Unity asset reference; null denotes unresolved or intentionally empty edges.

BundleRef.description: Reference to a Bundle node using stable PK.

bundlePk.description: Stable 8-hex identifier for the bundle node.

bundleName.description: Optional human-readable bundle name for readability.

SceneRef.description: Reference to a Scene using GUID.

sceneName.description: Optional scene name for human readability.

HierarchyPath.description: Complete hierarchical path from root to target entity.

bundlePath.description: Ordered list of bundle PKs from root to current bundle.

bundleNames.description: Human-readable bundle names corresponding to bundlePath.

pathId.description: Unity m_PathID that uniquely identifies an object inside the owning collection.
